query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.title,
  p.slug,
  p.`order`,
  LENGTH(p.mainText) as textLength,
  ROUND(LENGTH(p.mainText) / 5) as estimatedWords
FROM pages p
WHERE p.moduleId = 1
ORDER BY p.`order`
LIMIT 10;
